title: Happy Birthday, Kanan-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Happy birthday, Kanan-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>As a present, Iâ€™ll tell you your fortune. ğ…  So, what would you like to know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm...... I was thinking about challenging myself with something new this year. Is it going to go smoothly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>A new challenge, okay. Letâ€™s see...... The cards say...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>What do the cards say......!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm, I see... These are good cards. Youâ€™re very determined, and youâ€™re going to succeed. Kanan-chan, youâ€™ve already decided what exactly that challenge is going to be, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, you saw through me? Iâ€™m going to learn how to drive and get my license.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Iâ€™m sure youâ€™re going to get it! Your motor coordination skills are excellent.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, thanks! I think Iâ€™m more worried about the actual driving skills~ But thanks to your fortune-telling, I have confidence! Once I get my license, Iâ€™ll take you out on a drive! ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
